title: HELP!!! WHAT DO I DO RIOT?
body:
SOMEONE IS ON MY LEAGUE ACCOUNT and CLAIMS THEY ARE RIOT AND THAN ADDRESSED ME SPEAKING SPANISH FIRST WHEN IM CLEARLY ON A NA SEVER WHATS GOING on!???!!!

I cant get on someones in like...says Im playing and I dont know whats going on. I was playing on my second account when I saw my other account online. I talked to the person saying who is on my account and than the replied in spanish or something.
